mapper.select: SELECT oft.template_id, oft.template_code, oft.template_name, oft.is_free, oft.valuation_type, hutt.uom_type_name, oft.valuation_uom, hutl.uom_name, oft.object_version_number, oft.creation_date, oft.created_by, oft.last_updated_by, oft.last_update_date FROM o2md_freight_template oft LEFT JOIN hpfm_uom_type hut ON oft.valuation_type=hut.uom_type_code AND hut.enabled_flag = 1 LEFT JOIN hpfm_uom_type_tl hutt ON hut.uom_type_id=hutt.uom_type_id AND hutt.lang = #{lang} LEFT JOIN hpfm_uom hu ON oft.valuation_uom=hu.uom_code AND oft.valuation_type = hu.uom_type_code AND hu.enabled_flag = 1 LEFT JOIN hpfm_uom_tl hutl ON hu.uom_id=hutl.uom_id AND hutl.lang = #{lang} WHERE oft.template_id = #{templateId}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM o2pcm_platform_product opp WHERE opp.shelf_status = 'ON' AND opp.shipping_template_id = #{templateId}
